text: Gabrovo Province is a province in Bulgaria. The capital city is also named Gabrovo. Places of interest in Gabrovo province include architectural reserve Bozhentsi. Hiking is widely available in the Central Balkan National Park and in the Bulgarka Nature Park. ==Municipalities== The Gabrovo province has four municipalities. The following table shows the names of each municipality, the main town (in bold) or village, and the population of each as of 2009. Municipality Pop. Town/Village Pop. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - Bulgarian towns in 2009 „pop-stat.mashke.org“ Dryanovo 10,502 Dryanovo 8,043 Gabrovo 67,501 Gabrovo 60,281 Sevlievo 39,537 Sevlievo 24,065 Tryavna 12,461 Tryavna 9,831 ==References== Category:Provinces of Bulgaria
title: Gabrovo Province
